name: sea star...
description: inspired by the sea... this soft, comfortable hat has an unusual border and is finished with a sea star and button... hand knit in a lusciously soft yarn of 80% pima cotton and 20% seacell fiber... the hat fits a small child 18"-20" head care: wash by hand...lay flat to dry FREE SHIPPING within the U.S.! photos by Anna Myers

name: ocean...
description:
inspired by the colors of the Pacific in spring...

this little alpaca beanie is warm and lightweight...
perfect for our foggy coastal summers,
yet warm enough to wear in the snow...

fits a toddler
age 2-4
special orders welcome!

FREE SHIPPING...

care:
hand wash in cool water
lay flat to dry

WHY ALPACA?
Alpaca fiber is hypoallergenic. It has no lanolin or other oils, so people who are allergic to wool can wear alpaca next to the skin with no problem. 
Alpaca fiber has excellent, light-weight insulation.  It is three times warmer than sheepâ€™s wool.  It also wicks away water. 
Alpaca has a high tensile strength--it is very strong and long-wearing.

the alpaca yarn used in this sweater is from a Peruvian women's cooperative and is certified fair-trade...

description:

made with care and attention to detail,
the hat is hand knit in a fine pale mint green wool,
trimmed in white, and embellished with 
a hand-knit, hand-embroidered star...

fits newborn to 3 months...
ships immediately

care:  hand wash gently;  lay flat to dry

FREE SHIPPING!
